name: Active Trip Tracking Report
query:
SELECT
  name AS "Trip ID",
  date_created AS "Date Created",
  truck AS "Truck",
  customer AS "Customer",
  route AS "Route",
  workflow_state AS "Status",
  current_trip_milestone AS "Milestone",
  current_milestone_comment AS "Comment",
  updated_on AS "Updated On"
FROM `tabTrip`
WHERE workflow_state NOT IN ('Closed')
AND (%(start_date)s IS NULL OR %(start_date)s = '' OR date_created >= %(start_date)s)
AND (%(end_date)s IS NULL OR %(end_date)s = '' OR date_created <= %(end_date)s)
AND (%(client)s IS NULL OR %(client)s = '' OR customer = %(client)s);
